title: Presenting an unpurchased font
content:
How do you present to a client a logotype that you want them to purchase?  
Do you show them a type specimen and say “isn’t this great?”  
Of course there are ways to set the type in an online app and show them a screenshot, which is what I’ve been doing...

Just curious as to everyone’s methods.

Thank you!

 [‹ For Fun - Justice Videos](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011133721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43568 "Go to previous forum topic") [Just a suggestion for the Type ID board... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011133721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43544 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Aaron Kleid

comments.content: I assume you mean a font and not a logotype? Yes, a print out of an online sample works. Or getting a PDF specimen sample.
